sentences.en: "That's right!" Bobby exclaimed in wonder. "How did you remember that?"
sentences.cn: “对呀！”博比惊奇地叫道。“你是怎么想起那件事的？”

sentences.en: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.cn: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.en: He was too high on drugs and alcohol to remember them.
sentences.cn: 他吸毒酗酒后处于极度兴奋状态，已经记不得他们了。

sentences.en: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.cn: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.en: I can't remember the last time we went to the cinema.
sentences.cn: 我记不得上次我们去看电影是什么时候了。

sentences.en: I couldn't remember ever having felt so safe and secure.
sentences.cn: 我从未有过如此安全的感觉。

sentences.en: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.cn: 我希望他记得带酒。

sentences.en: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.cn: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.en: I remember now. He arrived just at the moment it happened.
sentences.cn: 现在我想起来了，他恰恰在事情发生的时候到了。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.cn: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.en: If you remember these three golden rules you won't go far wrong.
sentences.cn: 记住这三条金律，就不会错到哪儿。

sentences.en: No one got drunk as far as I can remember .
sentences.cn: 我记得当时没有人喝醉酒。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
sentences.cn: 记住，就事论事，不要把问题个人化。

sentences.en: Remember, the estate agent is working for the vendor.
sentences.cn: 记住，房地产代理商是为房地产卖方服务的。

sentences.en: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.cn: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.en: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.cn: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.en: They’ve lived here for as long as I can remember .
sentences.cn: 在我记忆中他们一直都住在这儿。

sentences.en: We remember our mother's stern instructions not to boast.
sentences.cn: 我们谨记母亲不许我们在人前炫耀的严厉教诲。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: Why can't I remember the exact year we married?
sentences.cn: 为什么我记不起我们结婚的准确年份了？

sentences.en: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.cn: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.en: You should remember it, and what's more, you should get it right.
sentences.cn: 你应该记住它，更重要的是，应该正确理解它。

words.tran_cn: 回想，回忆；纪念品；记忆力

phrases.tran_cn: 约束自己；检点；(犯过失后)反省；仔细想一想；恢复镇定
代某人向某人致意(或问好)
记得要做某事；记得去做某事

trans.tran_cn: 记得，想起，不忘（去做），纪念，代为问候，给送礼物
trans.tran_en: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past
